name: Memory Cave (PeterHainsworth, patrykz12, aoife baines)
description:
What would you do if you were trapped in a cave full of memories you tried to leave behind?

Join Abby as she rediscovers her past and remembers what she tried to forget. Jump, slide and hang on for dear life as you clamber your way though the enchanted crystal caves of Abby's memories. 

Experience up to 8 levels of platforming puzzle challenges and start to learn about Abby's painful past. 

  • Discover memories as Abby comes to terms with a relationship that never quite left her
  • Alter the caves around you to solve puzzles and manoeuvre across platforms
  • Master the simple controls as the gameplay and levels ramp up in complexity
  • Outrun a living memory as it tries to haunt and hinder you
  • Escape the cave and make peace with your past

A key and D key or Left and Right arrow keys to move

W key, Up arrow key or Spacebar to jump

S key or Down arrow key to slide
